trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Start-Process
trans-unit.target: Start-Process

trans-unit.source: Start-Process
trans-unit.target: Start-Process

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Starts one or more processes on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 启动本地计算机上的一个或多个进程。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: Default (Default)
trans-unit.target: 默认值 （默认值）

trans-unit.source: UseShellExecute
trans-unit.target: UseShellExecute

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: Starts one or more processes on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 启动本地计算机上的一个或多个进程。

trans-unit.source: To specify the program that runs in the process, enter an executable file or script file, or a file that can be opened by using a program on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定在进程中运行的程序，请输入可执行文件或脚本文件，或者可使用计算机上的程序打开的文件。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a non-executable file, Start-Process starts the program that is associated with the file, much like the Invoke-Item cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定不可执行文件，Start-Process 会启动与该文件关联的程序，这一点与 Invoke-Item cmdlet 非常类似。

trans-unit.source: You can use the parameters of Start-Process to specify options, such as loading a user profile, starting the process in a new window, or using alternate credentials.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Start-Process 的参数可以指定加载用户配置文件、在新窗口中启动进程或使用备用凭据等选项。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: This command starts a process that uses the Sort.exe file in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令启动一个进程，该进程使用当前目录中的 Sort.exe 文件。

trans-unit.source: The command uses all of the default values, including the default window style, working directory, and credentials.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用所有默认值，其中包括默认窗口样式、工作目录和凭据。

trans-unit.source: This command starts a process that prints the C:\PS-Test\MyFile.txt file.
trans-unit.target: 此命令启动一个打印 C:\PS-Test\MyFile.txt 文件的进程。

trans-unit.source: This command starts a process that sorts items in the Testsort.txt file and returns the sorted items in the Sorted.txt files.
trans-unit.target: 此命令启动一个进程，该进程对 Testsort.txt 文件中的项进行排序，然后在 Sorted.txt 文件中返回排序后的项。

trans-unit.source: Any errors are written to the SortError.txt file.
trans-unit.target: 所有错误都将写入 SortError.txt 文件中。

trans-unit.source: The UseNewEnvironment parameter specifies that the process runs with its own environment variables.
trans-unit.target: UseNewEnvironment 参数指定该进程使用自己的环境变量来运行。

trans-unit.source: This command starts the Notepad process.
trans-unit.target: 此命令启动 Notepad 进程。

trans-unit.source: It maximizes the window and retains the window until the process completes.
trans-unit.target: 它将最大化窗口并在该进程完成之前一直保留该窗口。

trans-unit.source: This command starts Windows PowerShell with the "Run as administrator" option.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用“以管理员身份运行”选项启动 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: These commands show how to find the verbs that can be used when starting a process, and the effect of using the verbs to start the process.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令展示了如何查找启动一个进程时可以使用的动词，以及使用该动词启动进程的效果。

trans-unit.source: The available verbs are determined by the file name extension of the file that runs in the process.
trans-unit.target: 可用的动词取决于进程中运行的文件的扩展名。

trans-unit.source: To find the verbs for a process, create a System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo object for the process file and look in the Verbs property of the object.
trans-unit.target: 若要为进程查找动词，请为该进程文件创建一个 System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo 对象，然后在该对象的 Verbs 属性中查看动词。

trans-unit.source: In this example, we'll use the PowerShell.exe file that runs in the PowerShell process.
trans-unit.target: 在本例中，我们将使用在 PowerShell 进程中运行的 PowerShell.exe 文件。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the New-Object cmdlet to create a System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo object for PowerShell.exe, the file that runs in the PowerShell process.
trans-unit.target: 第一条命令使用 New-Object cmdlet 为 PowerShell 进程中运行的 PowerShell.exe 文件创建一个 System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo 对象。

trans-unit.source: The command saves the ProcessStartInfo object in the $startExe variable.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将 ProcessStartInfo 对象保存在 $startExe 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The second command displays the values in the Verbs property of the ProcessStartInfo object in the $startExe variable.
trans-unit.target: 第二条命令显示 $startExe 变量中 ProcessStartInfo 对象的 Verbs 属性中的值。

trans-unit.source: The results show that you can use the Open and Runas verbs with PowerShell.exe, or with any process that runs a .exe file.
trans-unit.target: 结果显示，你可以为 PowerShell.exe 使用动词 Open 和 Runas，也可以为运行 .exe 文件的任意进程使用这两个动词。

trans-unit.source: The third command starts a PowerShell process with the Open verb.
trans-unit.target: 第三条命令使用动词 Open 启动 PowerShell 进程。

trans-unit.source: The Open verb starts the process in a new console window.
trans-unit.target: 动词 Open 在新的控制台窗口中启动该进程。

trans-unit.source: The fourth command starts a PowerShell process with the RunAs verb.
trans-unit.target: 第四条命令使用动词 RunAs 启动 PowerShell 进程。

trans-unit.source: The RunAs verb starts the process with permissions of a member of the Administrators group on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 动词 RunAs 使用计算机上 Administrators 组成员权限启动该进程。

trans-unit.source: This is the same as starting Windows PowerShell with the "Run as administrator" option.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等同于使用“以管理员身份运行”选项启动 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -ArgumentList
trans-unit.target: -ArgumentList

trans-unit.source: Specifies parameters or parameter values to use when starting the process.
trans-unit.target: 指定启动进程时要使用的参数或参数值。

trans-unit.source: The parameter name ("ArgumentList") is optional.
trans-unit.target: 参数名（“ArgumentList”）为可选项。

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定有权执行此操作的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: Type a user-name, such as "User01" or "Domain01\User01", or enter a PSCredential object, such as one from the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 键入用户名，如“User01”或“Domain01\User01”；或输入 PSCredential 对象，如 Get-Credential cmdlet 输入的一个 PSCredential 对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, the cmdlet uses the credentials of the current user.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该 cmdlet 使用当前用户的凭据。

trans-unit.source: -FilePath
trans-unit.target: 的文件路径

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path (optional) and file name of the program that runs in the process.
trans-unit.target: 指定在进程中运行的程序的路径（可选）和文件名。

trans-unit.source: Enter the name of an executable file or of a document, such as a .txt or .doc file, that is associated with a program on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 请输入与计算机上的程序相关联的可执行文件或文档（如 .txt 或 .doc 文件）的名称。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: If you specify only a file name, use the WorkingDirectory parameter to specify the path.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅指定文件名，请使用 WorkingDirectory 参数指定路径。

trans-unit.source: -LoadUserProfile
trans-unit.target: -LoadUserProfile

trans-unit.source: Loads the Windows user profile stored in the HKEY_USERS registry key for the current user.
trans-unit.target: 加载当前用户的 HKEY_USERS 注册表项中所存储的 Windows 用户配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 FALSE。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not affect the Windows PowerShell profiles.
trans-unit.target: 此参数不影响 Windows PowerShell 配置文件。

trans-unit.source: (See about_Profiles.)
trans-unit.target: （请参阅 about_Profiles。）

trans-unit.source: -NoNewWindow
trans-unit.target: -NoNewWindow

trans-unit.source: Start the new process in the current console window.
trans-unit.target: 在当前控制台窗口中启动新进程。

trans-unit.source: By default Windows PowerShell opens a new window.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Windows PowerShell 打开一个新窗口。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the **NoNewWindow** and **WindowStyle** parameters in the same command.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用 **NoNewWindow** 和 **WindowStyle** 同一命令中的参数。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Returns a process object for each process that the cmdlet started.
trans-unit.target: 为 cmdlet 启动的每个进程返回一个进程对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此 cmdlet 将不产生任何输出。

trans-unit.source: -RedirectStandardError
trans-unit.target: -RedirectStandardError

trans-unit.source: Sends any errors generated by the process to a file that you specify.
trans-unit.target: 将进程产生的所有错误发送给指定的文件。

trans-unit.source: Enter the path and file name.
trans-unit.target: 请输入路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: By default, the errors are displayed in the console.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在控制台中显示这些错误。

trans-unit.source: -RedirectStandardInput
trans-unit.target: -RedirectStandardInput

trans-unit.source: Reads input from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 从指定文件读取输入。

trans-unit.source: Enter the path and file name of the input file.
trans-unit.target: 请输入输入文件的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: By default, the process gets its input from the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，进程从键盘获取其输入。

trans-unit.source: -RedirectStandardOutput
trans-unit.target: -RedirectStandardOutput

trans-unit.source: Sends the output generated by the process to a file that you specify.
trans-unit.target: 将进程产生的输出发送给指定的文件。

trans-unit.source: Enter the path and file name.
trans-unit.target: 请输入路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: By default, the output is displayed in the console.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在控制台中显示该输出。

trans-unit.source: -UseNewEnvironment
trans-unit.target: -UseNewEnvironment

trans-unit.source: Use new environment variables specified for the process.
trans-unit.target: 使用为进程指定的新环境变量。

trans-unit.source: By default, the started process runs with the environment variables specified for the computer and user.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用为计算机和用户指定的环境变量运行启动的进程。

trans-unit.source: -Verb
trans-unit.target: 动词

trans-unit.source: Specifies a verb to use when starting the process.
trans-unit.target: 指定启动进程时要使用的动词。

trans-unit.source: The verbs that are available are determined by the file name extension of the file that runs in the process.
trans-unit.target: 可用的动词取决于进程中运行的文件的扩展名。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the verbs for some common process file types.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了适用于某些常用进程文件类型的动词。

trans-unit.source: To find the verbs that can be used with the file that runs in a process, use the New-Object cmdlet to create a System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo object for the file.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找进程中运行的文件适用的动词，请使用 New-Object cmdlet 来为该文件创建 System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo 对象。

trans-unit.source: The available verbs are in the Verbs property of the ProcessStartInfo object.
trans-unit.target: ProcessStartInfo 对象的 Verbs 属性中会显示可用的动词。

trans-unit.source: For details, see the examples.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅示例。

trans-unit.source: -Wait
trans-unit.target: -Wait

trans-unit.source: Waits for the specified process to complete before accepting more input.
trans-unit.target: 等到指定进程完成后再接受更多输入。

trans-unit.source: This parameter suppresses the command prompt or retains the window until the process completes.
trans-unit.target: 此参数禁止显示命令提示符或在进程完成之前一直保留窗口。

trans-unit.source: -WindowStyle
trans-unit.target: -WindowStyle

trans-unit.source: Specifies the state of the window that is used for the new process.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于新进程的窗口的状态。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are Normal, Hidden, Minimized, and Maximized.
trans-unit.target: 有效值包括 Normal、Hidden、Minimized 和 Maximized。

trans-unit.source: The default value is Normal.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 Normal。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the **WindowStyle** and **NoNewWindow** parameters in the same command.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用 **WindowStyle** 和 **NoNewWindow** 同一命令中的参数。

trans-unit.source: -WorkingDirectory
trans-unit.target: -WorkingDirectory

trans-unit.source: Specifies the location of the executable file or document that runs in the process.
trans-unit.target: 指定在进程中运行的可执行文件或文档的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为当前目录。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to Start-Process.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过管道将输入传递给 Start-Process。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None or System.Diagnostics.Process
trans-unit.target: 无或 System.Diagnostics.Process

trans-unit.source: When you use the PassThru parameter, Start-Process generates a System.Diagnostics.Process.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 PassThru 参数，则 Start-Process 生成 System.Diagnostics.Process。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not return any output.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此 cmdlet 不返回任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is implemented by using the Start method of the System.Diagnostics.Process class.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 通过使用 System.Diagnostics.Process 类的 Start 方法来实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this method, see "Process.Start Method" in the MSDN libraryhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143602 at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143602.
trans-unit.target: 有关此方法的详细信息，请参阅在 http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143602 MSDN libraryhttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143602 中的"Process.Start 方法"。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.target: Debug-Process

trans-unit.target: Get-Process

trans-unit.target: Start-Service

trans-unit.target: 停止进程

trans-unit.target: Wait-Process
